poem.title: Counterpoint
poem.author: Peter McCarey
poem.text: Flying to Cambodia Hearing - of all pundits - him Deplore the outrage I see the Angkor State Crowned by four colossal TV screens set back to back, The head of Henry the K is beaming out of every one. He must recite The myriad name of the unknown victim Till he get it right. K331, Piano variations. Cabin crew
